Detailed Description

Voltage Manager API implementation.

The Voltage API supports the following features:

  • Operating Performance Point (OPP)
  • AVS Class-0U
  • Adaptive Body Bias (ABB)

Function Documentation

static uint32_t PmhalVmGetVoltageIndex ( void  )
static

Read the package type and determine the index of the voltage to choose in the VM database.

Parameters
None
Returns
nomVoltageIndex Index of the voltage to choose in the VM database.
static uint32_t PmhalVmGetWtCnt ( void  )
static

Calculate the wait count (WTCNT) value. This value determines the duration ABB LDO waits to get to the target voltage. This value is in number of system clock cycles.

Parameters
None
Returns
Return the WTCNT value in units of 16 sys_clk cycles.
